entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
